segments.text: I notice the water gushing from the sink, flooding everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is soaked, but she's completely zoned out on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is spreading fast—it's going to ruin the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if someone slips on it? The kids could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is way up on that stool, stretching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so unstable; one wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, but she can't catch him if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies behind mom's back—naughty, but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a safe garden, but inside it's all danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds; my heart is racing just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked nearby, ready to crash if there's a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR
